Lake_Havasu_City.Havasu 95 Speedway:
Havasu 95 Speedway is a 0.25-mile (0.40 km) paved oval racing circuit located in Lake Havasu City, Arizona.
The track operates under ASA sanctioning, and primarily hosts weekly stock car events. Classes that run at the track include late models, modifieds, trucks, street stocks, legends, bandoleros, and factory stocks.
